content: double slip sock recipe this stitch pattern is intended to be added to a top down sock recipe it is not a sock pattern but rather an invitation to enhance your own favourite vanilla sock recipe and is a great way to add interest to socks knit with self striping yarn the sock pictured is a 64 stitch cast on and the stitch pattern is written for this number of stitches whilst written for a 64 stitch sock the pattern can be adjusted for various size socks by changing the number of stitches between the columns e g if knitting a 72 stitch sock knit 8 extra stitches after the second slip_stitch cast on and work your desired ribbing pictured is a 2x2 rib worked for fourteen rounds double slip pattern row 1 knit row 2 front of sock knit 4 slip 1 knit 1 slip 1 knit 18 slip 1 knit 1 slip 1 knit 4 back of sock knit all stitches row 3 repeat row 2 row 4 repeat row 2 repeat pattern for desired leg length insert heel i have used a basic slip_stitch heel and gusset but any top down heel can be used continuing pattern on front of sock knit foot to desired length finishing with row 1 knit toe created by samantha moran @makermoran makermoran@gmail com
